page.title: 19EVENTS
page.content: {We'll Meet Again} A while ago a film all about the Second World War.It was shot in Lenham.The village square was used as the main setting and for a while the residents of Lenham had to put up with having the film crew around the place.The village library was used as the Roxy Cinema and Rebecca's the antique shop,was the Post Office and general store. The Dog and Bear Public House was used for the Plough.The Village Hall was used for the dances and entertainment. Although it was exciting to see our village used it was rather annoying as vehicles could not be parked in the square.When the programme was shown it was fun seeing all the shops and the country lanes near Chilston Park that we know.
